tool_description: Finds thematically or conceptually related passages across different religious traditions and texts.

source_passage.description: The reference passage or verse to find cross-references for

source_tradition.description: Religious tradition of the source passage

relationship_type.description: Type of relationship: thematic, conceptual, historical, or linguistic

error_messages: Invalid source passage: Provide a valid passage reference or text.
Unknown source tradition: Specify a recognized religious tradition.
Target tradition not supported: One or more target traditions are not available.
No cross-references found: No related passages found in the specified traditions.
usage: Provide source_passage and source_tradition; optionally specify target_traditions and relationship_type. Returns related passages from other traditions with relationship explanations.

related_passages.description: Array of related passages from other traditions

relationship_explanations.description: Explanations of how each passage relates to the source
